data:
Sarcasm

a figure of speech that is the opposite of what is happening at the time. It is as a type of humor, usually used to make fun of someone.

When should we use sarcasm?

  • When someone says something very obvious

  • When somebody does something wrong

  • When something bad happens

  • When something unsurprising happens

Types of sarcasm

  • Self-deprecating sarcasm: This type of sarcasm expresses a deep sense of disapproval or despise towards oneself.

  • Brooding sarcasm: Criticisms are made politely, yet an ounce of bitterness drips from the speaker’s words.

  • Deadpan sarcasm: This an emotionless expression that leaves a listener wondering whether the speaker is joking or not.

  • Polite sarcasm: This requires a thorough analysis to fully comprehend. It may not be the most obvious form of sarcasm, but it’s definitely the most clever.

  • Obnoxious sarcasm: This kind of sarcasm is far from funny, in fact, it makes you want to punch the speaker in the face.

  • Manic sarcasm: This is portrayed when the speaker appears to be losing his or her mind in a weird, demented manner.

  • Raging sarcasm: Exaggeration and violent threats make up this category of sarcasm.

Situation

Sarcastic Remark

When something bad happens:

That's just what I needed today!

When someone has a low wage.

I work 40 hours a week for us to be this poor.

When you expected something to happen.

Well, what a surprise.

When a roommate is acting bizarre:

Is it time for your medication or mine?

When someone says something that is obvious:

Really, Sherlock? No! You are clever.

When someone does something wrong:

Very good; well done!

I spend $500 every month to look this ugly.

What planet did you come from?

Well, this day was a total waste of a good outfit.

Class is hell but with fluorescent lighting.

Not the brightest crayon in the box now, are we?

I think you left your talent at home.

Are you always this annoying or are you exerting extra effort today?

That speaker was so interesting that I barely needed to drink my third cup of coffee.

Tell me something I don’t know.

Too many weirdos and freaks on this planet, not enough circuses to cater to them all.

Take a picture, it’ll last longer.

It’s so thoughtful for the teacher to give us all this homework right before Spring Break.

Terrific! This is exactly what I need right now!

I’m not crazy, I’ve just been in a very bad mood for since the day I came out of my mother’s womb.

You call me lazy like it’s a bad thing

This is an excellent time for you to become a missing person.

I’m busy now. Can I ignore you some other time?

He always finds himself lost in thought; it’s unfamiliar territory.
